name: Ghosty (Sander Kambskard)
description:
WARNING: This game is in Danish. This game was made by me as a programmer, Frida Hansen and Søren Simoni as designers, Sofus Thomasen as playtester and Phillip isager as our project manager.

This is game is a school project. And we had a short amount of time to make it

Controls and Rules:

WASD = move boy. E = get attention as boy (Only possible when the slider on the left side of the screen is down at the bottom)

Arrows = Move Girl. PgDn = get attention as girl (Only possible when the slider on the left side of the screen is down at the bottom)

Lure the ghost into the green (ghost catching orb) to catch the ghost for 5 seconds. In that time you need to grab the key.

After the key is grabbed both players will need to enter a door

If the ghosts has your attention it means that it will only try to kill you

The red walls will kill you. The ghost will also kill you.
